solution_line_template: The second puzzle has {first_puzzle_pieces}*{more_pieces_factor}=<<{first_puzzle_pieces}*{more_pieces_factor}={second_puzzle_more_pieces}>>{second_puzzle_more_pieces} more pieces than the first

That means those two puzzles have {second_puzzle_total_pieces}*{num_other_puzzles}=<<{second_puzzle_total_pieces}*{num_other_puzzles}={total_pieces_second_and_third}>>{total_pieces_second_and_third} pieces
So in total there were {total_pieces_second_and_third}+{first_puzzle_pieces}=<<{total_pieces_second_and_third}+{first_puzzle_pieces}={total_pieces_all_puzzles}>>{total_pieces_all_puzzles} pieces
